stripped_text: +1 mu +1 link Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may force the Corp to "Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccessful, the Runner bypasses the currently encountered ice." Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] +1[link] Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may force the Corp to "Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccessful, the Runner bypasses the currently encountered ice." Limit 1 console per player.
title: Security Nexus
